alert.note: Alert for Braxton; Calhoun; Clay; Gilmer; Kanawha; Ritchie; Roane (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 10:15AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Calhoun, southeastern Ritchie, northeastern Kanawha, western Gilmer, southwestern Braxton, Roane and northwestern Clay Counties through 1045 AM EDT... At 1015 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Spencer to 7 miles northwest of Amma to near Clendenin. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor water issues could occur. Locations impacted include... Spencer, Grantsville, Clendenin, Arnoldsburg, Big Otter, Wallback, Amma, Nebo, Shock, Millstone, Rosedale, Mount Zion, Newberne, Left Hand, Big Springs, Stumptown, Tanner, Annamoriah, Harmony and Tariff. This includes Interstate 79 between mile markers 14 and 49. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
